problem_statement: Build a full-stack scheduling platform where service providers can define availability (recurring + one-off), customers can book/reschedule/cancel appointments in real time, and the system reliably prevents double bookings while handling time zones, policies, and role-based access. The app must be production-ready using RedwoodJS (Web + API), Prisma, GraphQL, and Cells, with a scalable architecture for future features like notifications, payments, and organizations.
